options: ['Yes, it is.', "Yes, it isn't.", 'No, it is.', "No, it isn't."]
article: My name is Tom Black. This is my cousin, Jack Smith. That is his dog. That computer is my cousin's. The orange notebook is his, too. I have a good friend. Her name is Mary Smith. Is this her watch? No, it isn't. It is black, It is mine. Hers is white.
